title: Henri Rouart in front of his Factory
credit_line: Acquired through the generosity of the Sarah Mellon Scaife Family
provenance_text:
Hilaire-Germain-Edgar Degas [1834-1917], Paris, France. Henri Rouart [1833-1912], Paris, France; Ernest Rouart, his son [1874-1942], Paris, France; Mme. Julie Manet Rouart, his wife [1878-1966], Paris, France, until 1960; Cl√©ment Rouart, their son, Paris, France, in 1960; Private Collection, Paris, France; Wildenstein & Company, Inc., New York, NY, until December 1969; purchased by Museum, December 1969 [1]. 
NOTES:1. Updated by CGK July 2012.
